General.Name: Guangxi Radio and Television Information Network Corp Ltd
General.Description: Guangxi Radio and Television Information Network Corporation Limited provides radio and television network services in China. The company provides broadcasting and television transmission; and development and services of information technology. It also engages in the digital television; private network business; smart radio cloud; and big data businesses. The company was formerly known as Guangxi Broadcast Television Network Transmission Company and changed its name to Guangxi Radio and Television Information Network Corporation Limited. The company was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in Nanning, China.
General.Address: Guangxi Radio and Television Comprehensi, Nanning, China, 530028
